name.ja: ガーディアン・エアトス

summoning_condition.en: If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: Send 1 face-up Equip Spell Card from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Shuffle up to 3 monsters from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, this card gains ATK equal to [the number of monsters shuffled by this effect] x 500 until the end of this turn.
